label: full name
text: Soo Jin Takeda (name chosen at age ~20)

label: date first created (irl)
text: circa 2007

label: nicknames
text: Sooj (mostly from Jason)

label: pronouns
text: ze/zir

label: gender
text: agender; DFAB trans; just slightly masc-of-center

label: birth date
text: November 6, 1991

label: orientation
text: aromantic pansexual; attracted particularly to androgynous presentations as a teen/early 20s and then later shifts toward being primarily attracted to masc-presenting people; very loosely identifies as achillean

label: race/ethnicity
text: half Korean-American (second generation) and half Japanese-American; has some Korean cultural identity

label: family
text: parents and three siblings, none of whom ze's especially close with; believes strongly in found family and values close friends more highly than relatives

label: other relationships
text: bestest friends for life with Aubrey; they grew up as neighbors and Soo Jin was basically part of Aubrey's family. close friends with Jason since middle school and eventually partners in some timelines.

label: location
text: grows up in Groveport, OH; goes to college in Pittsburgh, PA; in some timelines ends up in NYC or Boston

label: occupation
text: comics artist, biomedical engineer, and/or pharmacologist (would like to be a full-time illustrator but does the other two because money and ze happens to be good at it)

label: build
text: petite, though ze often hides it under bulky clothes

label: voice
text: often lilting, fluctuates between sugary-sweet and having a sarcastic edge, can be shockingly caustic when needed. wide pitch range.

label: manner
text: easygoing, laughs a lot. can seem demure at times, but quite boisterous at others.

label: aesthetic
text: big sweaters, fluffy skirts, and combat boots

label: interests
text: comics (reading them and drawing them), horror, anime, video games

label: favorite colors
text: red, granny smith green

label: favorite bands/artists
text: Tool, Placebo, Maretu

label: brigade symbol
text: apple
